thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.ca
thread.title: Angelica Tailleur

author: Angelica Tailleur
title: Angelica Tailleur
text:
Monica was everything any client may wish for. She was fast, friendly and gave me the best price and fastest delivery day compare to all the Quote: s I received from other providers.
All the other providers couldn't deliver on time, because of the Chinese New Year, but Monica was able to meet my deadline.
I didn't understand the company policy on having the box delivered to the address of the credit card. I have never heard of such policy before. I even buy things from amazon and have them deliver to the office. Monica didn't made a problem of this, she solved it for me! The company shouldn't have such policies which can only create challenges for the clients.
